RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 12 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $8,500 Or Less Not Considered). (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.) .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EMPEROROFTHEDARK set pace, driving. AMIGO'S AFFAIR rallied, second best. CATES SWOOSH rallied. FUNKY MUSIC dueled for lead, tired. FREE SPEECH no threat. BUTTON BOX steadied, gave way.

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Buck Pond Farm Inc. & Rob Auerbach

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 12 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races No t Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HURRY ON OUT moved up on turn, swung wide, lugged in, driving. MALIBU COWBOY moved up four wide, led, just missed. TIMBERRY TIDDLER dueled, weakened. CHASING A PAYDAY no threat. ZERO FOR CONDUCT dueled early,tired. SOLAR TAP outrun. HARTEL brief speed, gave way.

ENTRY.OWNER: Batchelder Stephen H and Jack Ventures LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up on turn, swung wide, lugged in,driving

ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up four wide, led, just missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 12 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KITTEN CALLS settled early, rallied, split rivals, driving. FIRST IMPRESSION surged late, gained place. LIAM'S LASS steadied start, moved eight wide down backstretch, just missed place. VINEGAR VEGGIES dueled, tired. DON'T LOOK UP contested pace, gave way. GORMLEYESQUE outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied start, moved eight wide,just missed place

ENTRY.OWNER: Burnett Brett Kilgore Shannon and Nicks William A

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE SEPTEMBER 12, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAPTAIN RILEY saved ground, rallied, up late. BIG FALCON ROCKET reserved early, rallied. CUSTOM INFINITY set pace, faltered late. STRONG LIL KOKORO spotty effort. FIND YOUR BOAZ lacked final bid. CAVALLOTTO up close, tired.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 12 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT ALIBI pressed pace, won driving. DEJOHN set pace, battled gamely in stretch, second best. BLUE SKY PAINTER brushed start, rallied. AGADOR SPARTACUS moved up to challenge on turn, gave way. TODAY MATTERS no factor. BECKHAM JAMES outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Dejohn
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, battled gamely, second best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 2F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Winners At Two Furlongs in 2022-2023 To Carry An Additional 2 lbs. For Each Such Race Won).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLDEN NOLE broke sharply, won driving. MS HEADLEY late surge. LOST ANCHOR held show. CAN SHE SCOOT came in. PROMINENT HENNY came out. STRADARI lost path early.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: LATER DAYS rushed to command, won driving. ACCOLADES GALORE rallied for place. MAUREENLOVESFRANK rallied. CONTENT wide, needed more. ORBIT MARS up close, tired. IN TO THE NIGHT no factor. AMERICAN BOUND up close, gave way. M J GOLD outrun, eased late.

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: The Revocable Trust of Dr. Mikel C.Harrington & Patricia O

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
